thread.title: Minals Marks Official Product Launch
thread.title_full: Minals Marks Official Product Launch | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: Minals Marks Official Product Launch
text:
(MENAFN Press) Introducing Minals Mark's brand new "" bangle to the market available with 7 charms and free pearl earrings- the only bangle available with 7 charms and pearl earrings. Each charm is handpicked to be representative to the owner and show compassion through a more personal way.  Each charm has a specific meaning that represents the owner in a particular way; this makes the bracelet unique but also makes the love to the person more direct and special. These gifts can be given any time during the year to celebrate love devotion commitment and appreciation. 
Not only do the bangles have many charms by they are "excellent bracelets beautiful stylish" and "for ladies of all ages". The fact that the bangles are adjustable allows maximum comfort for the owner and allows adjusting for whoever requires it. The delicate coloration displays elegance and sophistication; true â€˜luxury and style'. Moreover the silver alloy of the bangle will not leave any marks on the wearer's skin and will prevent any harm done to them. 
This new bangle compares a person's love to the distance to the moon and back which really shows devotion commitment and would definitely be "perfect as a gift". These bracelets can be given to anyone; a spouse a sister or a friend they can fit any hand and show love to anyone. The packaging of the bangle in the Minal's bangle box looks stylish with the gold handwriting contrasting with the black of the box seeming "just perfect" and would make a "gorgeous gift".

About Minals Mark
Minals Mark specializes in adjustable and expandable bracelets. They offer bespoke  and bracelets for loved ones everywhere.
